# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_internal/commands/__init__.py
@source-hash: e6844ef4eddd336b
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:58:23Z

## Purpose
Central command registry and factory for pip's command-line interface. Provides lazy loading of command classes and command name auto-correction functionality.

## Key Components

### CommandInfo NamedTuple (L11)
- Structure: `(module_path, class_name, summary)`
- Stores metadata for each pip command without importing the actual command classes
- Enables lazy loading to avoid costly imports during help display

### commands_dict Dictionary (L20-106)
- Maps command names to CommandInfo instances
- Contains all 17 pip commands: install, download, uninstall, freeze, inspect, list, show, check, config, search, cache, index, wheel, hash, completion, debug, help
- Order matters for help display output
- Uses full module paths for easier testing

### create_command Function (L109-118)
- **Purpose**: Command factory that dynamically imports and instantiates command classes
- **Parameters**: `name` (command name), `**kwargs` (additional arguments)
- **Returns**: Command instance
- **Process**: Looks up CommandInfo, imports module, gets class, instantiates with metadata

### get_similar_commands Function (L121-132)
- **Purpose**: Auto-correct functionality for typosed command names
- **Uses**: `difflib.get_close_matches` for fuzzy string matching
- **Returns**: Closest matching command name or None
- **Behavior**: Case-insensitive matching against command registry keys

## Dependencies
- `importlib`: Dynamic module loading for command classes
- `collections.namedtuple`: CommandInfo structure
- `typing`: Type hints
- `pip._internal.cli.base_command.Command`: Base command class interface
- `difflib`: Fuzzy string matching (imported lazily in get_similar_commands)

## Architectural Patterns
- **Lazy Loading**: Commands aren't imported until actually needed
- **Registry Pattern**: Central dictionary maps names to command metadata
- **Factory Pattern**: create_command abstracts command instantiation
- **Plugin Architecture**: Easy to add new commands by updating commands_dict
